SELECT DISTINCT JOBHUNTPOST.JOBHUNTPOST_id, JOBHUNTPOST.MEMBER_id, ( SELECT POSTIMG.POSTIMG_name FROM POSTIMG WHERE POSTIMG.POST_id = JOBHUNTPOST.JOBHUNTPOST_id ORDER BY POSTIMG.POSTIMG_id ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS POSTIMG_name, MEMBER.MEMBER_nickname, JOBHUNTPOST.JOBHUNTPOST_title, JOBHUNTPOST.JOBHUNTPOST_content, JOBHUNTPOST.JOBHUNTPOST_date, JOBHUNTPOST.JOBHUNTPOST_viewcnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECOMMEND WHERE RECOMMEND.POST_id = JOBHUNTPOST.JOBHUNTPOST_id ) AS RECOMMEND_cnt FROM JOBHUNTPOST INNER JOIN MEMBER ON JOBHUNTPOST.MEMBER_id = MEMBER.MEMBER_id LEFT JOIN RECOMMEND ON JOBHUNTPOST.JOBHUNTPOST_id = RECOMMEND.POST_id WHERE 1=1
AND JOBHUNTPOST.JOBHUNTPOST_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchInput},'%')
AND JOBHUNTPOST.JOBHUNTPOST_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchInput},'%')
AND MEMBER.MEMBER_nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchInput},'%')
AND MEMBER_nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchInput},'%') OR JOBHUNTPOST.JOBHUNTPOST_content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchInput},'%')
AND JOBHUNTPOST.JOBHUNTPOST_role LIKE CONCAT('%',#{jobHuntPostRole},'%')
AND JOBHUNTPOST.JOBHUNTPOST_region LIKE CONCAT('%',#{jobHuntPostRegion},'%')
AND JOBHUNTPOST.JOBHUNTPOST_concept LIKE CONCAT('%',#{jobHuntPostConcept},'%')
AND JOBHUNTPOST_pay BETWEEN #{minPay} AND #{maxPay}
AND JOBHUNTPOST_workDate BETWEEN #{startWorkDate} AND #{endWorkDate}
AND DATE(JOBHUNTPOST_date) BETWEEN #{fromday} AND #{today}
ORDER BY JOBHUNTPOST.JOBHUNTPOST_date DESC
